extends android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.ViewHolder

    • Field Detail

      • tvId

        private final android.widget.TextView tvId
        The "tvId" field contains the identifier for the product. It is provided within the is hidden ("gone") in the text view.

      • tvName

        private final android.widget.TextView tvName
        The product tvName.

      • tvShortDescription

        private final android.widget.TextView tvShortDescription
        A short description of the product.

      • ivProductImage

        private final android.widget.ImageView ivProductImage
        Product image view.

      • imageLoader

        private final ImageLoader imageLoader
        Object to load and display a product image.

      • onClickListenerRow

        private final ProductListRecyclerAdapter.ProductListViewHolder.OnClickListenerRow onClickListenerRow
        A single instance of OnClickListener that can be used for all rows in the displayed product list. We could use a lambda expression instead of creating a whole new class, but Android's support of Java 8 isn't complete enough yet for it to be worthwhile (even with Jack, there are trade offs).

    • Constructor Detail

      • ProductListViewHolder

        ProductListViewHolder(android.view.View itemView,
                      ProductListRecyclerAdapter.ViewType viewType)
        Constructor for the ViewHolder. Save references to the relevant fields within the View.
        Parameters:
        itemView - the View (row) to be managed by this ViewHolder.
        viewType - the type of the View for the row. The View is actually the same for both ViewTypes, but HEADER doesn't have an OnClickListener callback.

    • Method Detail

      • bindHeader

        void bindHeader()
        Binds column names to the header row.

      • formatHeaderField

        private void formatHeaderField(android.widget.TextView tv,
                               java.lang.String label)
        Utility method to format header fields.

      • bindData

        void bindData(ProductInfo pi)
        Binds actual data passed in by the adapter. Called directly by the adapter's onBindViewHolder() method. This exists so that the data can be kept privately within this ViewHolder.
        Parameters:
        pi - the product info for a specific product, read in as JSON from the cloud.
